meanings.def: a British charity that works to help people with mental illnesses. It collects money to pay for support services, gives advice to people who are affected by mental illness, and aims to make people more aware of mental health issues. It was established in 1946 as the National Association for Mental Health, and changed its name to MIND in 1972. In the 1990s this became Mind.
